oai_dc:dc.dc:title: EVALUATION OF MICROWAVE LINAC CAVITY FIELD AND PARAMETERS BY THE FINITE-ELEMENT METHOD
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: ROY, R
SHANKER, O
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A program has been written to calculate the resonant frequency, electromagnetic fields and other quantities for a microwave cavity of complex shape. The program uses the FEM and is written in C language. It has been run on a 386 PC-AT system. The results agree with measured values on cavities fabricated at our institution and also with published values in the literature.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: INDIAN JOURNAL OF PURE & APPLIED PHYSICS, 30(5), 207-210
